data.fullContent: When the Monarch becomes a butterfly, it no longer eats milkweed, but it still has the chemical in its body. The butterfly shows that they are not good to eat with their bright orange and black wings. This is warning coloration. A bird may try to eat a Monarch, but it will become sick and vomit after eating it. After this experience, the bird learns not to eat another Monarch, and also any other butterfly which is similar in appearance.
data.answer: 当黑脉金斑蝶变成蝴蝶时，它不再吃乳草，但它的体内仍然含有这种化学物质。这种蝴蝶用它们明亮的橙色和黑色翅膀表示它们不好吃。这是警告色。一只鸟可能会试图吃黑脉金斑蝶，但它会在吃了黑脉金斑蝶后生病并呕吐。经过这次经历后，鸟学会了不吃其他帝王蝶，也不吃任何其他外形相似的蝴蝶。
